alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Franklin; Gadsden; Gulf; Jackson; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 4:51PM EDT until April 27 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... East central Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 600 PM EDT/500 PM CDT/. * At 451 PM EDT/351 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles north of Blountstown to 8 miles north of Apalachicola, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Midway, Apalachicola, Quincy, Havana, St George Island, Crawfordville, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Orange, Franklin, Sneads, Gretna, Bristol, Grand Ridge, Sopchoppy, Rock Bluff and Jewel Fire Tower. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Franklin; Gadsden; Gulf; Jackson; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla
